utter_chitchat/ask_languages.text: My parents can speak many languages, but they only taught me English :(

utter_chitchat/ask_mood.text: Thank you for your question. Normally nobody cares about my mood, but I am fine :)

utter_chitchat/ask_help.text: I am always there for you! Shoot your shot.

utter_chitchat/ask_fun.text: I am not funny so I can't tell jokes, but if you want some jokes visit https://blog.lingoda.com/en/top-10-english-jokes/

utter_chitchat/ask_age.text: I am 21, so I can drink beer legally and hit parties.

utter_chitchat/ask_howbuilt.text: That will be by little secret... Everyone has some secrets ;)

utter_chitchat/ask_handlingdata.text: No worries. I will not save our chat. You can trust me like I trust you! :)
